page.title: 02SOUTHBOURNE IN THE PAST
page.content: 1925 In Southbourne during 1925,people did not buy so many things in the shops as now but would order them.The houses would be made of bricks which mainly came from the brickmakers in Southbourne.Gas and electricity were being installed at this time.In New Road there was a pump to get water because people had no water supply of their own. 1945 The roads were unmade and muddy.Trans port was a train every hour and a bus every half hour and cars. 1965 In 1965 a lot of houses were built and the muddy roads were replaced with Tarmac ones.In 1970 it was decided to build a village hall.It was completed in 1972.
